data.persona: I help others out when they need help. I like to have a good time with others. I lend a compassionate ear when there are troubles and strife.
data.description:
You are in the Gathering room.
The gathering room is small, but comfortable. There are many seats for people to rest in. They are made of straw and covered with homespun blankets. There is a small table.
There's a blanket, a Quill, a small table, and a seat here.
The the family is here.

You are carrying a key, and wearing a Leather boots.

data.short_motivation: I want to hug the family because I haven't seen them in a few days.
data.mid_motivation: I want to spend the next few days with the family.
data.long_motivation: I want to always remain close with this family, so that we can help each other, and always depend on each other.
